name: 5 Minute Flexer
description:
You want to enter a guild... but you need cool items to flex with before they'll let you in! Open as many chests as possible to collect rare items to fill your flexmeter before sign-ups end. Can you do it?

This is our (winnie33 & shashbot) entry for the itch.io weekly game jam competition 113 with the theme "5 minute hero". 

This was made possible thanks to:

-Joe Williamson for the item pixel art

-Chequered Ink for the cool font

-My sister for fixing the "2" in aforementioned font

-Edermunizz for the forest art

-Frelon-k-games for the music that we threw in 10 minutes before uploading
